sec.div: Effect of cinnamon essential oil on the forced swimming test
sec.p: There were no differences among groups in the acute study when essential oil was administered three times as mentioned in the methods section (data not shown).

div.p: A: Time (sec) spent immobile in the forced swimming test (FST) (mean±SEM) and B: in the tail suspension test (mean±SEM) in mice during a 6-2=4 min test. Mice were injected with vehicle control, essential oil (0.5, 1, and 2 mg/kg, IP), fluoxetine, and desipramine (10 mg/kg, IP), for a 14 day treatment. *** P<0.001 is significantly different from the control group
